name: Ball Run (itch)
description:
Ball Run is a simple game in which you try to navigate and guide a ball through different stages and obstacles. Your ball can climb walls, hang from ledges, and roll across the floor. If you want to test your skill, you can try to collect tokens on each stage.

Ball Run is designed to be a family friendly game that is entertaining to all ages. The levels are easy enough to be completed by a younger player, but are also fun to play if you are a more experienced gamer.
